typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tcrossreference
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		COMPANY_NAME as string,
		MAIN_EMPLOYER as decimal(38,18),
		CONTRACT_TYPE as string,
		CONTRACT_DESC as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		AD_NAME as string,
		JOBPHONE as string,
		SHORTPHONE as string,
		JOBMOBILE as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		COSTC as string,
		LAST_UPDATE as timestamp,
		POSITION as string,
		POSITION_TITLE as string,
		SENIORITY as string,
		SEN_TITLE as string,
		DISPLAY_NAME as string,
		OFFICE as string,
		STATUS as string,
		STATUS_DESC as string,
		CONTR_DATE_FROM as timestamp,
		CONTR_DATE_TO as timestamp,
		GARD_NO as decimal(38,18),
		THE_BRIDGE as decimal(38,18),
		P_GARD_NO as decimal(38,18),
		P_THE_BRIDGE as decimal(38,18),
		NICKNAME as string,
		COSTC_STATUS as string,
		P_MYGARD_FX as decimal(38,18)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> UdvEmployee
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> GSyndicate
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> GEmployee
tcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 329) ~> employee
xrefEmployee aggregate(groupBy(target_description),
	target_code = first(target_code)) ~> deduplicator
employee select(mapColumn(
		target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefEmployee
LkpSUdvAgsEmployee derive(empl_name = substring(target_description, 1, 40)) ~> Expression
Expression select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE = target_description,
		EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,
		EXPIRATION_TO_DATE,
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		JOBPHONE,
		JOBMOBILE,
		EMAIL,
		OFFICE,
		EMPL_NAME = empl_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PrepareBeforeDeduplicator
deduplicator, UdvEmployee lookup(target_description == AD_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpSUdvAgsEmployee
PrepareBeforeDeduplicator aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE,
		EXPIRATION_TO_DATE = EXPIRATION_TO_DATE,
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		JOBPHONE,
		EMAIL,
		OFFICE,
		EMPL_NAME),
	EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE = last(EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE)) ~> Deduplicator0
Deduplicator0 alterRow() ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_employee.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimEmployee
